title: Protecting Their Mate, Part Seven
description: Protecting Their Mate, Part Seven (Of Eight)Blake's control is tested as outsiders descend on the pack's territory, and Ashley discovers that following her heart may be the only way to find her mate.This is the seventh installment in PROTECTING THEIR MATE, an erotic BBW paranormal romance serial set in the world of The Last Pack. It contains strong language and explicit sex with multiple partners. For adult readers.
author: Mia Thorne
